Creating This Website

This is the start of my document on how I created this website.

For now I’m am just going to list things that I did while I’m actually creating this website.

  1. I used Jekyll. I didn’t use it for any specific reason, I just was spending too much time comparing the different frameworks and arbitrarily picked one.
  2. Started with the Jekyll Quick-start guide, and then followed with some more of the documents.
  3. Wasn’t make my desired progress, so later tried another tutorial, which helped me create a very basic site.
  4. Now I wanted to get some style, so I used the Hyde theme as a basis for which to design the site.
